ticket.title: Fix failing partial tests - A side effect of a fix added for Ruby 1.9 compat.
ticket.original-body:
2 tests started failing after this "commit":http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/b5b1576aa9c5606a8ac9862b4a903aa5e196ef02
I've attached a patch along to fix the tests.
@@@ 1) Error: test_partial_collection_shorthand_with_different_types_of_records(RenderTest): NoMethodError: undefined method `include?' for nil:NilClass ticket.original-body-html:
2 tests started failing after this commit

I've attached a patch along to fix the tests.


  1) Error:
test_partial_collection_shorthand_with_different_types_of_records(RenderTest):

version.body:
2 tests started failing after this "commit":http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/b5b1576aa9c5606a8ac9862b4a903aa5e196ef02
I've attached a patch along to fix the tests.
